doc.repnme: Transcript of oral history interview with Mrs. Louise Woods held on November 8, 1985
doc.abstracts: In November 1985, Mrs. Louise Woods was interviewed on behalf of the World Bank Archives oral history program by Robert W. Oliver. She was the wife of George Woods, the fourth president of the World Bank Group from 1963 to 1968. Her transcript concerns the investment banking group First Boston, her husband’s friendships with clients, and her travels to Russia, Japan, Iran, and Iraq.
